title: XRP Price Prediction 2023-2032 [After Lawsuit]: $1 Coming Soon?

title: Bill Ackman Increases Alphabet Stake, Banking on AI Potential
description: Renowned hedge fund manager Bill Ackman has made a significant move in his portfolio by adding more Alphabet Inc. (GOOG, GOOGL) stock worth over $1 billion. While this investment in the tech giant may raise eyebrows, it reflects Ackman’s belief in Alphabet’s potential in the growing field of artificial intelligence (AI). This move comes amidst ... title: OKX reacts to new UK crypto regulations, reduces listed tokens
description: In an Oct. 8 update on its website, OKX stated that it had tailored a compliant user experience in line with the FCA’s new crypto promotion rules.
